scripts.rust:build-wasm:node: rimraf ./pkg/node && WASM_BINDGEN_WEAKREF=1 wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg/node
scripts.rust:build-wasm:browser: rimraf ./pkg/browser && WASM_BINDGEN_WEAKREF=1 wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg/browser
scripts.rust:build-wasm: npm run rust:build-wasm:node && npm run rust:build-wasm:browser
scripts.build-all: npm run clean && npm run rust:build-wasm && npm run postbuild
